attributes.action: Stop community partnerships staging days of action on council estates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local Authourity/housing association tenants should not allow 'community safety partnerships' to enter estates of working class people to support DVLA to remove untaxed cars. It sends out a negative message to residents who are normally law abiding and contributes to preventing reporting of ASB in there neighbourhoods. It prevents a bond between local people and the Police and contributes to further resentment. It's not rocket science. Stop alienating road tax cheats and concentrate on the major companies such as Tesco who evade REAL taxes. Gordon,Get a grip.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
